Headline: #39 Pershing Temporary Reroute at Pershing/Albany
ShortDescription: 39 Pershing buses are temp. rerouted in both directions via Pershing, Kedzie, Archer, California and Pershing, due to a street blockage near Pershing/Albany

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pershing, Kedzie, Archer, California, then will continue their normal route on Pershing, due to a street blockage near Pershing/Albany.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-Bound Purple and 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Belmont
ShortDescription: Loop-Bound Purple and 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing in the area of Belmont due to an injured customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-Bound Purple and 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing in the area of Belmont due to an injured customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
